content: Once you have the vine, take the upper path back toward the Longevity Road Shrine, where you'll encounter a two Crow Diviners - one up on a ledge to lure you, and a friend hiding in the bushes nearby.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Once you have the vine, take the upper path back toward the Longevity Road Shrine, where you'll encounter a two Crow Diviners - one up on a ledge to lure you, and a friend hiding in the bushes nearby.
